text: Shane Tuck (24 December 1981 - 20 July 2020) was a professional Australian rules footballer. He played for the Richmond Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL) between 2004 to 2013. Before, he played with Hawthorn Football Club from 2000 to 2001. Tuck was born in Victoria, Australia. Tuck died on 20 July 2020 at the age of 38 by suicide. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Tuck had been suffering from severe chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== Category:1981 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia) Category:Suicide in 2020 Category:Suicides in Australia
title: Shane Tuck
